post:
**HostingAbove Technologies**, recently founded. We decided to build a business plan revolving around offering superior, reliable, and affordable services without compromising quality. Our process is simple. You order the services at an affordable rate, while we deploy enterprise grade equipment and be there for your duration of service with us while remaining contract free. Our Enterprise-Grade dedicated servers is an option with guarantees for no disappointment. Pricing is offered on month to month terms, backing our no-nonsense promises and commitments.

**LowEndTalk Virtual Private Server (Special)**
--
256MB RAM | 512MB Burstable
10GB Disk Space (RAID)
5,000GB Bandwidth (gigE)
1,000mbps shared connection port
Self-Managed
6.95USD p/m with no commitment
[https://core.hostingabove.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=57](https://core.hostingabove.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=57)

*Instant activation will all approved orders.

**Do we own the equipment?**
--
Yes, we sure do! We own all our equipment from the switches to hard drives.

**Do you own the data center?**
--
No we do not, we own space in a facility based in Lenoir, North Carolina.

**Do you offer 24x7 based technical support?**
--
We sure do! We will be completely honest with you, we have certified system administrators based all around the globe from India, the United States, and Canada. Whatever the problem, one of our phenomenal technicians will be happy to assist.

**Have Questions?**
--
Be sure to contact one of our sales representatives by either email, calling us toll free, or reaching us over our live chat. We will be happy to answer any questions or concerns that you may have with us.

We look forward to serving you in the near future!
